item.description:
Every Wednesday night Gracie's restaurant has wine flights. This week's flight will be "Citrus Essence & Sauvignon Blanc". It is $10 for three wine tastings and complimentary treats pairing.

For more info check out http://www.graciespro...
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the itty bitty Asian woman waiting outside Gracie's between 5:15 and 5:30 pm. Once I'm inside you can reach me on my cell. Message me to get the number...
item.why: A great way to break up the work week and relax after a long day
item.name: Wine Flight @ Gracie's
